entry.title: i-amankitsingh/autosize-input-box: A lightweight, customizable React component that mimics modern chat input fields. It supports dynamic text wrapping using a contentEditable div and displays a placeholder when the field is empty — perfect for messaging apps, chatbots, or support UIs.

entry.title: reshot2005/MoopanKeyGenerator: MoopanKey's Wordlist Generator is a lightweight yet powerful tool designed to create custom password lists for ethical hacking, cybersecurity testing, and awareness training. Inspired by the wisdom of the ancient "Moopan" — the tribal guardian — this tool helps security enthusiasts simulate real-world password patterns to uncover weak credentials
entry.content: MoopanKey's Wordlist Generator is a lightweight yet powerful tool designed to create custom password lists for ethical hacking, cybersecurity testing, and awareness training. Inspired by the wisdom of the ancient "Moopan" — the tribal guardian — this tool helps security enthusiasts simulate real-world password patterns to uncover weak credentials

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: warren-bank/node-request-cli: An extremely lightweight HTTP request client for the command-line. Supports: http, https, proxy, redirects, cookies, content-encoding, multipart/form-data, multi-threading, recursive website crawling and mirroring.
entry.content: An extremely lightweight HTTP request client for the command-line. Supports: http, https, proxy, redirects, cookies, content-encoding, multipart/form-data, multi-threading, recursive website crawling and mirroring.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
